Module dev.orne.config

Package dev.orne.config

package dev.orne.config
Configuration management system. Provides an abstract method to retrieve configuration parameters to the libraries and applications in a underlying configuration storage agnostic way.
Since:
1.0
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    dev.orne.config.commons
    Configuration management system replacement based on Apache Commons.
    dev.orne.config.impl
    Internal implementations of configuration instances.
    dev.orne.config.spring
    Spring framework support for configuration management system.
